definition: spoon/ladle/CL:把[ba3]/abbr. for 公勺[gong1 shao2], centiliter (unit of volume)

son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)

sentences.english: Drew dripped the drink from the dipper, but he did not drink the drops.
sentences.chinese: 德鲁让大勺子里的饮料滴下来，却没有喝。

sentences.english: Pull a brief informal note to be his paste the enlightenment that find a person, before long somebody claim ladle.
sentences.chinese: 拉条子为他张贴了寻人启示，不久有人认领了勺子。

sentences.english: She scraped with a spoon to feed me apple.
sentences.chinese: 她用勺子把苹果刮下来喂我吃。

sentences.english: The next day, she spooned some of the bacon grease into a pan and fried eggs in it.
sentences.chinese: 第二天，她用勺子拿一些熏肉油脂放到锅里来煎鸡蛋。

sentences.english: So the bowl won't move around and it's easier to scoop up the rice with your spoon.
sentences.chinese: 这样碗就不会动来动去，你用勺子舀饭就会比较容易。

sentences.english: When hit with a spoon, the brass candlestick will ring.
sentences.chinese: 拿勺子敲敲那铜烛台，能敲出清脆的响声。

sentences.english: Don't scoop up too much with your spoon.
sentences.chinese: 每次用勺子舀得少一点，别舀那么多。

sentences.english: Place the soup bowl above the soup spoon and to the right.
sentences.chinese: 汤碗放在喝汤的勺子的右前方。

sentences.english: Because the water can be kept at a constant temperature (with the use of a thermometer), you can not overcook the meat.
sentences.chinese: 最后的肉会变得非常软，以至于你都可以用勺子割开。

sentences.english: He likes to use wooden spoons.
Use a big spoon to skim the layer off, and set this layer aside.
sentences.chinese: 用根大勺子把这一层动物脂捞出来，放到一边。

sentences.english: One bowl is very big and has a very big spoon beside it .
sentences.chinese: 一只碗很大，帝国边放着一把很大的勺子。

sentences.english: After they brought the ice cream, everyone dug in with their spoons.
sentences.chinese: 他们买了冰激凌，每个人都用勺子挖着吃了起来。

sentences.english: Avocados are simple to cut using a knife and a spoon.
sentences.chinese: 鳄梨是使用简单，切割刀和勺子。

definition: spoon/ladle/CL:把[ba3]/abbr. for 公勺[gong1 shao2], centiliter (unit of volume)
see 鍋|锅[guo1]/see 涮鍋子|涮锅子[shuan4 guo1 zi5]/bowl (of a smoking pipe etc)
